title: Design of ICT-Based Creative Language Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT application skills and job-related language proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhancing creative problem-solving competencies in language domains through smartphone-centered limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design one creative project to solve language problems using ICT tools
Learners can complete collaborative projects based on self-efficacy in digital environments
Learners can develop language solutions tailored to real-world job situations by applying an inquiry-based approach

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
